articles.description: PRINCE PHILIP was chair of the Restoration Committee after the Windsor Castle fire  and had a particular scathing comment about how it was funded.

articles.author: Christopher Bucktin
articles.title: Sharon Osbourne claims The Talk bosses set her up as more racism allegations emerge - Mirror Online
articles.description: Sharon Osbourne has vehemently denied using racist language towards her co-stars on The Talk, and claimed she was set up by producers to discuss Piers Morgan
articles.content:
Sharon Osbourne has vehemently denied ever using racist language after being accused of calling an American-Asian co-presenter on her US chat show "wonton".
The Brit labelled the allegations "crap, … [+2387 chars]

articles.title: Patsy Palmer issues statement over storming off Good Morning Britain interview - Birmingham Live
articles.description: The former EastEnders actress, known for playing Bianca Fowler, was on the show via video link from Malibu
articles.content:
Patsy Palmer has addressed her explosive appearance on Good Morning Britain today after storming out of an interview.
